item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: President 'only person' who can end Ukraine war: Gabbard

item.title: Kieran Culkin says wife owes him a 4th kid for winning an Oscar
item.description: Kieran Culkin won an Academy Award for best supporting actor in "A Real Pain" and reminded his wife about a promise they made.
